CONTRACT_ID: One hundred and ninety-eight improved eight-ninety-nine
short_summary: This instrument will be used for depositing thin conductive metal films and carbon films on specimen surfaces suitable for scanning electron microscopic analysis.
description: CanmetENERGY Devon (CE-D) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1), combined sputter coater and carbon evaporator for use in the marine conservation targets project.
